review: This is the HDMI add-on that everyone should have.I have watched Amazon streaming movies on my computer, usually without problems. This TV Fire Stick adds a streaming buffer that provides perfect viewing. It took less that three minutes to configure and then the thing worked flawlessly.I have to admit that it is so logical and linear ... I didn't read the instructions. As a Prime member it came pre-configured with my info (really nice)!I will purchase another one for my "man cave".
